Legitimate companies will remove your email address from their spam lists if you use the unsubscribe link included in their messages. It is much harder to get off a scam company's list, but you can take some steps to stop the barrage of junk email. Spam email can clog your inbox even if you use a good spam filter. Junk emailers are always looking for new ways to defeat filters and get their messages in front of your eyes.

How to block and un-block mail from a specific sender. Yahoo! Mail makes it easy to block unwanted messages from a known address. It's just as easy to remove the block if you want to.
